Throughout the year, observe children &: Selemo ha ntse se tsamaya, shebella bana  mme o kenye ditemoho tsa hao.
Let's pretend you're tracking progress f: Ha re nke eka o beile leihlo kgatelopele ya ngwana ya bitswang Themba. Kobola mona hore o qale!
You will be shown the right assessment f: O tla bontshwa tekanyetso e nepahetseng bakeng sa dilemo tsa ngwana.
Pretend that, while observing Temba, you: Iketse eka, ha o ntse o shebelletse Themba, o elellwa hore o a bososela. Kobola “E” ho araba!
Great!\n\n If you are not sure if Temba: Ke hantle! Haeba o se na bonnete ba hore Themba a ka etsa ho hong, o ka kgetha “Ha ke tsebe”
Some questions have pictures attached.\n:
Dipotso tse ding di na le ditshwantsho tse hoketsweng.

Kobola mona ho bona setshwantsho.
Tap close to hide the picture and go bac: Kobola kwala ho pata setshwantsho mme o kgutlele morao ho sala morao kgatelopele.
You can always leave the progress tracke: O ka dula o ntse o tlohela kgatelopele mme o tle o kgutlele ho yona ha morao ho qetella. Dikarabo tsa hao kaofela di tla bolokwa. Kobola mona.
When you have answered all the questions: Ha o arabile dipotso kaofela, o ka etsa tlaleho bakeng sa mohlokomedi kapa o ka nna wa sheba dikarabo tsa hao hape.
You can see all of your completed report: O ka sheba ditlaleho tsohle tsa hao tse phethilweng leqepheng la ditlaleho tsa sehlooho.
Great job, you're ready to start!: Ke hantle, o se o loketse ho qala!
